step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your shoulder and elbow a little straighter to feel more resistance.
You're doing well opening your palm and fingers wide. Focus on a slightly straighter elbow to maximize the stretch.
Excellent job making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. Keep that wrist straight.
Great job opening your hand and relaxing while exhaling. Try to keep your elbow a bit straighter for better fluid movement.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with the overhead pumping exercise. Remember to stretch your arm overhead and open your hand wide. Make a fist while inhaling and open your hand while exhaling to help move fluid.
